subject: Football
Sports Medicine
lead_paragraph: Chris Ellis, a rookie defensive end for Buffalo, has been placed on season-ending injured reserve because of an ankle injury. Ellis, a third-round draft pick out of Virginia Tech, had played the last seven games and was credited with seven tackles. The injury kept him from practicing as the Bills (6-6) prepared to host the Miami Dolphins (7-5) in Toronto on Sunday.
